rev.desc.rev.desc: The following modifications were made for Employee Self Service (ESS):
Added a parameter as input to this application. Parameter name is $INTO.OMIT.CANCEL.CONFIRMATION. Parameter type is cond.input (boolean).

If the value in this parameter is false (a NULL value is regarded to be false), then when the Back button is pressed on the script being called, the Cancel Confirmation display will not be bypassed (ie, the Cancel Confrimation WILL BE DISPLAYED). If the value in the parameter is true, then the Cancel Confirmation display will be bypassed (ie, the Cancel Confirmation will NOT be displayed).
Modified this panel to pass to script.execute this new parameter.

descript.descript: The following modifications were made for Employee Self Service (ESS):
Added a parameter as input to this application. Parameter name is $INTO.OMIT.CANCEL.CONFIRMATION. Parameter type is cond.input (boolean).

If the value in this parameter is false (a NULL value is regarded to be false), then when the Back button is pressed on the script being called, the Cancel Confirmation display will not be bypassed (ie, the Cancel Confrimation WILL BE DISPLAYED). If the value in the parameter is true, then the Cancel Confirmation display will be bypassed (ie, the Cancel Confirmation will NOT be displayed).
Modified this panel to pass to script.execute this new parameter.
